title: Currently in Warby Parker's website banners
author: mbavio

comments.content:
Considering the upper terminal on C I believe the image is closer to the Mecanorma digital version of Globe Gothic Bold  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/globe-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/globe-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/globe-gothic/")  
than to Signata BQ.  
Don
I think Don is right, "C" is a bit different and Globe Gothic Bold seems to be the one here. Signata BQ is very similar by the way.
